Boston.One Post Office Square: One Post Office Square is a 40-floor modern skyscraper in the Financial District section of Boston, Massachusetts. The skyscraper is Boston's 11th-tallest building, standing 525 feet (160 m) tall. The building has exactly 831,975 square feet of Class A office space. An attached, eight-level parking garage offers 368 parking spaces and direct access to the building's lobby. It overlooks Post Office Square Park and was designed by Jung Brannen Associates.
